examples.example: 朋友之间的信任是非常珍贵的财富。

translate.english: Trust between friends is a very precious wealth.

examples.example: 老师对学生充分的信任能够激发学生的无限潜能。

translate.english: Full trust of teachers in students can stimulate the unlimited potential of students.

examples.example: 当我们彼此信任时，任何困难都能携手勇敢面对。

translate.english: When we trust each other, any difficulty can be faced bravely hand in hand.
